quest.name: Tide Goes in, Imperials Go Out
journal: Lyse is not sure what to make of Isari.
objectives: Search for villagers in need of aid.
Speak with one of the Confederates.

dialogue.name: VILLAGERA02489
dialogue.text: Ugh... My back, my back...

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB02489
dialogue.text: Don't hurt me, please! I swear, I didn't do anything!

dialogue.name: PIRATE02481
dialogue.text: Heh heh. Saw the smoke, did you?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: They didn't follow you, did they? I gave you enough time to escape?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Good, good... And don't worry─I'll try not to make a habit out of it.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Something definitely happened here. I see several people who look like they might be injured. Let's give them a hand and find out what we missed.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Hm? Do I need help? Oh, I'll be fine. It's nothing that won't heal. You should go after Lyse.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Ugh... What was it Thancred once said about battle scars and maidens? Naught worth repeating in polite company, I'm sure...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I see. I'm glad Soroban reached you in time...

dialogue.name: PIRATE02490
dialogue.text: The captain scoffed at first, but Tansui convinced him to at least muster our forces...

dialogue.name: VILLAGERA02489
dialogue.text: Thank you, my child. When the fighting started, I tried to run and hide, but fell and could not regain my feet...

dialogue.name: VILLAGERA02489
dialogue.text: I thought for sure that we would all be slaughtered, but the pirates drove them off! I never thought I would see the day when the Confederacy came to our aid!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERA02489
dialogue.text: Thank you for your concern, but I shall be fine. There is no more need for running, after all!

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB02489
dialogue.text:
Uwaaaaaah!
Oh, you're not an imperial. Is...is it over?

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB02489
dialogue.text: Kami be praised! I was certain she would have us all killed and burn Isari to the ground─or kill us after making us watch, or barricade us in our homes before putting them to the torch...

dialogue.name: VILLAGERB02489
dialogue.text: We had heard stories about the viceroy, but that was the first time any of us had seen her in the flesh...and I should be glad if I never see her again.

dialogue.name: PIRATE02481
dialogue.text: I remember you! You're the one who saved me from the Doman catchers!

dialogue.name: PIRATE02481
dialogue.text: Thanks to you, we managed to rescue the fishermen and my kidnapped comrades─one of whom joined the Confederacy with me long ago. It would've broken my heart to have had to bury him...

dialogue.name: PIRATE02481
dialogue.text: Oh, and if you're looking for the captain, you'll find him in the tavern.

dialogue.name: PIRATE02481
dialogue.text: You should've seen it! The captain was a bleedin' whirlwind of death!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Back already? What have you learned?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: At the tavern, you say? In that case, we should find Lyse and speak with him together.
